content:
# It appears that after waiting, no iron plates were produced, and my inventory remains unchanged with 10 units of coal, 5 units of stone, and 10 units of iron ore.
# This indicates that the smelting process did not complete successfully.

# I will check the furnace's status and its contents to diagnose the issue.
furnace_status = get_entities()  # Retrieve the current state of the entities, including the furnace.
print(f"Furnace Status: {furnace_status}")  # Display the current status of the furnace.
